snippet: Masked gunmen robbed a post office in Gaza City on Monday, stealing what local news reports said was the equivalent of about $500,000.
abstract: Masked gunmen rob a post office in Gaza City, stealing equivalent of about $500,000; theft is rare act of criminal violence against a government institution run by Hamas.
lead_paragraph: Masked gunmen robbed a post office in Gaza City on Monday, stealing what local news reports said was the equivalent of about $500,000.

headline.main: Thieves in Gaza Go Where Money Is, but Hamas Quickly Gets It Back
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Thieves Go Where Money Is, but Hamas Quickly Gets It Back
